snippet: According to N.F.L. figures, there have been 21 suspensions this calendar year because of failed tests for performance-enhancing drugs, including amphetamines like Adderall.
abstract: NFL figures show there has been 21 suspensions in 2012 because of failed tests for performance-enhancing drugs, including Adderall, a 75 percent increase over the 12 suspensions announced in 2011; drug acts as a strong stimulant in those without attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.
lead_paragraph: According to N.F.L. figures, there have been 21 suspensions this calendar year because of failed tests for performance-enhancing drugs, including amphetamines like Adderall.

headline.seo: Adderall, a Drug of Increased Focus for N.F.L. Players
headline.main: Drug of Focus Is at Center of Suspensions
headline.print_headline: Drug of Focus Is at Center of Suspensions
